title: The Intelligence - “Things said with great confidence 48 hours ago don’t look true now”—America’s elections
summary:
The daily podcast looks at what comes next, assesses our election forecast and tags along with our correspondents on election dayTHE OUTCOME remains unclear as vote-counting continues.
We look at some of the surprise results, ask what happens next and examine how The Economist’s election forecast has held up.
And we tag along with our American correspondents for the thrill of election-night reporting.
Runtime: 21minListen on: Apple Podcasts | Spotify | Google | Stitcher | TuneInThe latest results are here www.economist.com/us2020results; for full access to print, digital and audio editions of The Economist, subscribe here www.economist.com/intelligenceoffer
